name: Halloween Candy Catch (sòsó)
description:
Click and drag your Halloween bowl, catch the good candies (M&Ms, Reese's, Starbursts), and avoid having too many bad ones (Raisins, Tootsy Rolls).

Attributions:

- Background

- Sun-Maid Raisin Sprite

- Tootsy Roll Sprite

- Starburst Sprite

- M&M Sprite

- Reese's Cups Sprite

- Candy Bowl

- Monster Pumpkin Font

- Organ Music Effect

- "Yuck" Sound Effect

- "Yummy" Sound Effect

- General code from class
